entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
